about_the_game:
The "Approaching Infinity" universe is limitless: procedural space stretches on forever, filled with sprawling planets and deep caves, 18 sentient alien species, hundreds of quests, and 9 paths to victory.

The demo gives you 7 sectors to decide if you want more. Achievements are turned off, but everything else is fully functional.

name: Approaching Infinity Demo
short_description: Approaching Infinity is a turn-based RPG in the spirit of the sci-fi classics. Explore an infinite procedural universe full of diverse locations and factions. Engage in tactical battles, trade, diplomacy, asteroid mining, crafting, and much more. No level cap. Get OP. Play how you want!
